summary: My \"True to Skyrim\" (TTS) series that aims to overhaul NPCs by maintaining their original personality through modified looks and/or behavior.
descriptionHtml:
I am so far really pleased with my Ysolda overhaul, so I\'ve decided to share. She looks adorable now and I made her a follower, which she is great at! She will not run away from combat, but will fight alongside you. You can ask her to do anything for you! Hope you like having her as a follower as much as I do. Please see known issues below before installing this mod.

========================================
ABOUT TRUE TO SKYRIM SERIES (TTS)
========================================
\"True to Skyrim\" (TTS) series is a series of mods that aim to overhaul NPCs by maintaining their original personality through modified looks and/or behavior.

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=15891]TTS - Uthgerd the Unbroken[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=16961]TTS - Aela the Huntress[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17133]TTS - Camilla Valerius[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=17820]TTS - Lydia[/url]

========================================
REQUIREMENTS
========================================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10168]ApachiiSkyHair[/url]

========================================
OPTIONALS (IF YOU WANT HER TO RESEMBLE THE SCREENSHOT!)
========================================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=10357]ApachiiSkyHair Retexture[/url] (Wild)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=6554]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=4869]Covereyes[/url] (#3)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url] (Extract eyebrows only or overwrite with CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible)
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=515]More Freckles by Zhoken[/url] (Cute Freckles)

========================================
USAGE
========================================
Extract file to your Skyrim Data folder. Make sure to enable the .ESP file before starting the game.

========================================
KNOWN ISSUES
========================================
The follower dialog will not appear if Ysolda is already in your save games. In other words, if you\'ve already encountered her, it will not work. But, you can try the following console command as a workaround:

Enter the console (press ~), click on Ysolda, type \"addtofaction 0005C84D 1\" (without the quotes) and hit enter. Press ~ again to close the console.

========================================
CREDITS
========================================
Bethesda
Skyrim NPC Editor
author: hulebjoern

files.name: TTS - Ysolda with Follower Support - Standalone
